Text.Page:
. Glad you're here. Let me brief you on our situation.

We're surrounded by Thulsa's cavalry.

Fortunately for us, they're not yet fully equipped for an attack, which means we have the perfect chance to eliminate the dragoons and their leader, Selvereth.

I don't need to tell you the rest....
You're as brave as I'd heard! If we had more <PCCLASS:lcase>s like you, this war would be over pretty quickly!
